mapper.update: UPDATE pay_pay_accflow T SET T.COREPROCSTATUS = #{coreProcStatus}, T.CORERETCODE = #{coreRetCode}, T.CORERETMSG = #{coreRetMsg}, T.COREACCTDATE = #{coreAcctDate}, T.CORESERNO = #{coreSerno}, T.LASTUPDATE = #{lastUpDate}, T.LASTUPTIME = #{lastUpTime}, T.LASTMICROSECOND = #{lastMicroSecond} WHERE T.COREREQDATE = #{coreReqDate} AND T.COREREQSERNO = #{coreReqSerno}

UPDATE pay_pay_accflow T SET T.COREPROCSTATUS = #{coreProcStatus}, T.CORERETCODE = #{coreRetCode}, T.CORERETMSG = #{coreRetMsg}, T.COREACCTDATE = #{coreAcctDate}, T.CORESERNO = #{coreSerno}, T.ORIGCOREACCTDATE = #{origCoreAcctDate}, T.ORIGCORESERNO = #{origCoreSerno}, T.LASTUPDATE = #{lastUpDate}, T.LASTUPTIME = #{lastUpTime}, T.LASTMICROSECOND = #{lastMicroSecond} WHERE T.COREREQDATE = #{coreReqDate} AND T.COREREQSERNO = #{coreReqSerno}

UPDATE pay_pay_accflow T SET T.COREPROCSTATUS = #{coreProcStatus}, T.CORERETCODE = #{coreRetCode}, T.CORERETMSG = #{coreRetMsg},
T.COREACCTDATE = #{coreAcctDate},
T.CORESERNO = #{coreSerno},
T.LASTUPDATE = #{lastUpDate}, T.LASTUPTIME = #{lastUpTime}, T.LASTMICROSECOND = #{lastMicroSecond} WHERE T.COREREQDATE = #{coreReqDate} AND T.COREREQSERNO = #{coreReqSerno}
mapper.select: SELECT T.COREREQDATE coreReqDate, T.COREREQSERNO coreReqSerno, T.REVTRANFLAG revTranFlag, T.BRNO brno, T.PAYDATE payDate, T.PAYSERNO paySerno, T.ACCTBRNO acctBrno, T.BOOKTYPE bookType, T.AMOUNT amount, T.CORETRXTYPE coreTrxType, T.CORETRXCODE coreTrxCode, T.COREPROCSTATUS coreProcStatus, T.PAYERACCT payerAcct, T.PAYERNAME payeeName, T.PAYEENAME origCoreReqDate, T.ORIGCOREREQDATE origCoreReqDate, T.ORIGCOREREQSERNO origCoreReqSerno, T.ORIGPAYDATE origPayDate, T.ORIGPAYSERNO origPaySerno FROM pay_pay_accflow T where T.PAYDATE = #{payDate} and T.PAYSERNO = #{paySerno} order by LASTUPDATE desc,LASTUPTIME desc limit 1

SELECT T.COREREQDATE coreReqDate, T.COREREQSERNO coreReqSerno, T.REVTRANFLAG revTranFlag, T.BRNO brno, T.PAYDATE payDate, T.PAYSERNO paySerno, T.ACCTBRNO acctBrno, T.BOOKTYPE bookType, T.AMOUNT amount, T.CURRENCY currency, T.CORESYSID coreSysId, T.CORETRXTYPE coreTrxType, T.CORETRXCODE coreTrxCode, T.COREPROCSTATUS coreProcStatus, T.PAYERACCT payerAcct, T.PAYERNAME payerName, T.PAYEEACCT payeeAcct, T.PAYEENAME payeeName, T.ORIGCOREREQDATE origCoreReqDate, T.ORIGCOREREQSERNO origCoreReqSerno, T.ORIGPAYDATE origPayDate, T.ORIGPAYSERNO origPaySerno FROM pay_pay_accflow T where T.COREREQDATE = #{coreReqDate} and T.COREREQSERNO = #{coreReqSerno}
mapper.update: UPDATE pay_pay_accflow T SET T.COREPROCSTATUS = #{coreProcStatus}, T.LASTUPDATE = #{lastUpDate}, T.LASTUPTIME = #{lastUpTime}, T.LASTMICROSECOND = #{lastMicroSecond} WHERE T.COREREQDATE = #{coreReqDate} AND T.COREREQSERNO = #{coreReqSerno}
